mapper.select: select * from member order by member_idx asc
select * from member where id=#{id} and pass=#{pass}
mapper.insert: insert into member(member_idx, id, pass, name, email) values(#{member_idx},#{id},#{pass},#{name},#{email})
mapper.update: update member set id=#{id}, pass=#{pass} , name=#{name}, email=#{email} where member_idx=#{member_idx}
